What are the top three strategies, supported by scientific evidence, that can be implemented to conserve energy in buildings?
[Latex]
\begin{enumerate}
\item Install energy-efficient lighting such as LED bulbs that use less energy than traditional incandescent bulbs and last longer.
\item Insulate walls, roofs, and windows to reduce heat loss in winter and heat gain in summer, resulting in lower energy consumption for heating and cooling.
\item Upgrade heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems with high-efficiency models that can save up to 30% on energy bills.
\end{enumerate}
